pgTitle: List of bridges on the National Register of Historic Places in Michigan

rows.text: County Road 557–West Branch Escanaba River Bridge
Denton Road–Sparks Foundation Park Pond Bridge
Derby Street–Grand Trunk Western Railroad Bridge
East River Road–North Hickory Canal Bridge
Fort Street–Pleasant Street and Norfolk & Western Railroad Viaduct
Indian Lake Road Stone Arch Bridge
Jeddo Road–South Branch Mill Creek Drain Bridge
Jefferson Avenue–Huron River and Harbin Drive–Silver Creek Canal Bridges
Mill Street–South Branch Raisin River Bridge
North Watervliet Road–Paw Paw Lake Outlet Bridge
Trowbridge Road–Grand Trunk Western Railroad Bridge
